body_html:
I am using Power8 box.. and dont see this issue.
python ./cifar10_multi_gpu_train.py --data_dir=/mldl/NVME/scratch/inception_output_data/ --train_dir=/tmp/ --num_gpus 4 --batch_size 512 --max_steps 200

As you can see in the arguments.. i am using 4 gpu's and batch size of 512

I tried it with TensorFlow 1.0.1 and using libc6_2.23-0ubuntu5_ppc64el.deb
Kernel : 4.4.0-59-generic

python ./cifar10_multi_gpu_train.py --data_dir=/mldl/NVME/scratch/inception_output_data/ --train_dir=/tmp/ --num_gpus 4 --batch_size 512 --max_steps 200
